name: Animals Matter To Me
about: Animals Matter To Me is a clinical rescue facility for strays & abandoned ownerless animals, birds & reptiles in need of help. It runs a shelter cum hospital in Malad, Mumbai and offers services of Adoption, Animal Shelter, Medical Treatment, Sterilisation & Animal Ambulance.

compensation.description: Socialise with the animals & walk them

compensation.descritption: Provide medical care to the animals

locations.street_address: Animals Matter To Me, Bungalow 13, 14, 15 Chikoowadi Lane, Malad Marve Road, Malad West
